attributes.action: demand the BBC is brought fully within the scope of the NAO[National Audit Office].
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The BBC is a self-serving organisation,that pays no regard to demands,that it's operational structure reflects a need for vfm across all it's distribution channels.The NAO has the independence [rather than the BBC Trust Board] to perform the necessary vfm audits.
